## About

This SOAD online event discusses the Barcelona Declaration and what Swiss signatories are doing to advance openness of research information in using, producing, and fostering it across platforms and infrastructures.

Speakers include Melanie Rothlisberger (University Library Zurich), Anne Gentil-Beccot (CERN), and Daniel Stekhoven (Swiss Reproducibility Network). The session is moderated by Janina Radny (Lib4RI).
